data.name: Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden Pixel Art Set
data.detailed_description:
Replaces all character and enemy illustrations from Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden with pixel art.
*The appearance will not change in some sections.
*This content is also available for sale as part of a set. Please take care not to re-purchase the same products.
data.about_the_game:
Replaces all character and enemy illustrations from Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden with pixel art.
*The appearance will not change in some sections.

data.short_description: Replaces all character and enemy illustrations from Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden with pixel art.

fullgame.name: Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1/10 64-bit (ver.1909 and above)
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Maximum resolution: 1920x1080 Monitor capable of 60FPS+ required Supports Keyboard, Mouse and XINPUT gamepads
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1/10 64-bit (ver.1909 and above)
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 270X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Maximum resolution: 1920x1080 Monitor capable of 60FPS+ required Supports Keyboard, Mouse and XINPUT gamepads
